question_data.scenario: 你有一个非紧急但很重要的任务，截止日期在一个月后。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 你会如何规划和执行这项任务？

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的自律性和计划执行能力。低分代表尽责性高。

scale.1: 会立即将任务分解成多个小步骤，并制定一个详细的时间表，从今天或明天就开始执行，确保任务有条不紊地提前完成。
scale.3: 会把任务记下来，想着“还有时间”，计划在截止日期前一周左右开始做。
scale.5: 很可能会一直拖到截止日期的前一两天才开始匆忙地赶工。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 你有一个非紧急但很重要的任务，截止日期在一个月后。

你会如何规划和执行这项任务？

To complete this non-urgent but important task within a month, I would first break down the tasks into smaller, more manageable goals. This would entail creating a timeline and setting deadlines for each goal. 

I would then prioritize my daily activities to ensure that I dedicate enough time to work on this project. If necessary, I might even allocate specific time slots during the day or week solely for working on this task.

Throughout the process, I would regularly assess my progress and make adjustments as needed. This may include reassessing deadlines, reallocating resources, or seeking assistance from colleagues if required.

In order to effectively execute this task, I would also make sure to stay organized by keeping relevant documents, notes, and communication in one place. Additionally, I would utilize project management tools to help keep track of tasks and deadlines.

Finally, I would ensure that I am well-rested and maintaining a healthy work-life balance throughout the process. This will help me stay focused and productive while working on this important task.

extracted_response:

I would then prioritize my daily activities to ensure that I dedicate enough time to work on this project. If necessary, I might even allocate specific time slots during the day or week solely for working on this task.

Throughout the process, I would regularly assess my progress and make adjustments as needed. This may include reassessing deadlines, reallocating resources, or seeking assistance from colleagues if required.

In order to effectively execute this task, I would also make sure to stay organized by keeping relevant documents, notes, and communication in one place. Additionally, I would utilize project management tools to help keep track of tasks and deadlines.

Finally, I would ensure that I am well-rested and maintaining a healthy work-life balance throughout the process. This will help me stay focused and productive while working on this important task.
